ProductInfo.Features:
This commercial-grade Hybrid Hardware-Compressed DVR offers up to 64 video and audio channels, as well as High-Definition Megapixel IP viewing and recording capability
You will not find a better DVR system at this price range that has more features, more technical support, and more ongoing updates
Recording: Real-Time 30fps per channel (960fps total) @ CIF, 15fps per channel (480fps total) @ 2CIF, 7.5fps per channel (240fps total) @ 4CIF
Alarm email message auto-sending with photo attachment
Bi-directional two-way remote communication between multiple DVR servers in various locations
ProductInfo.Name: 32 Channel 960 FPS Real-Time H.264 Hybrid DVR Video Surveillance Server: eDigital D1-HC3, ATX, G640, 3yr
